subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national capacity for inclusive governance and coordination of national HIV responses, and for the protection of human rights of people affected by HIV, including women and other vulnerable groups
subproject.description: A joint China UN Avian and Pandemic Influenza (API) Programme was discussed with the Chinese government and a China UN Pandemic Preparedness Plan (PPP) was finalized. As part of the UNPPP,UNDP’s main task consists of providing managerial and financial support for interagency planning and coordination across all UN country team members, and provide a strategic framework for a collective response within and beyond the UN system. It provides assistance to the government to bring together ministries and other stakeholders to formulate national inter-ministerial preparedness and response plans and to develop and coordinate multi-sectoral programmes.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Avian Influenza in China

title: Prevention and Prepareness for Pandemic Influenza China
